fullDescription.intro: Repeats the rows and columns of the layer input. Corresponds to the Keras Upsampling 2D Layer.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.
A tuple of two integers. The upsampling factors per dimension.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add an Upsampling 2D layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Upsampling 2D layer.
